tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE underwriting_criteria (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    income DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    credit_score INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
  PolicyID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  PolicyType INT NOT NULL,
  CriteriaID INT NOT NULL,
  Approved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  FOREIGN KEY (PolicyType) REFERENCES PolicyTypes(TypeID),
  FOREIGN KEY (CriteriaID) REFERENCES Criteria(CriteriaID)
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    underwriter_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (underwriter_id) REFERENCES Underwriters(underwriter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Applicants (
    applicant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    income DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    policy_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES Policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_id INT NOT NULL,
    criteria_id INT NOT NULL,
    application_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (applicant_id) REFERENCES Applicants(applicant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (criteria_id) REFERENCES Criteria(criteria_id)
);
